CatDescriptText: Bob White, student, Glenshaw, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11 with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: "It depends on the amount of automation.  I think automation will put more people out of work in proportion to the number to be compensated for in a shorter work week."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Bob White wearing light colored overcoat with upturned collar and striped sweater, posed in front of building, Downtown
